title: Rocket Arena - Wikipedia
snippet: Rocket Arena is a multi-purpose arena in Cleveland, Ohio. The building is the home of the Cleveland Cavaliers of the National Basketball Association (NBA) and the Cleveland Monsters of the American Hockey League (AHL). It also serves as a secondary arena for Cleveland State Vikings men's and ...

title: Rocket Arena
snippet: Rocket Arena, located in downtown Cleveland, is the premier sports and entertainment facility that is home to the Cavs, Monsters, and many other special events.

title: Cleveland Cavaliers | Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse
snippet: The Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse, located in downtown Cleveland, is the premier sports and entertainment facility in Northeast Ohio and is home to the Cavaliers, Monsters, and many other concerts and special events.

title: Cleveland Cavaliers | Things to Do in Cleveland Ohio
snippet: When the Cleveland Cavaliers NBA team plays a home game, crowds pile into Quicken Loans Arena. This is Cleveland after all; passion and sports teams go together like pizza and beer.
